question: What is the name of the 10th edition of Indo Maldives joint exercise which was organized in Pune?
explanation: The name of the 10th edition of Indo Maldives joint exercise is Ekuverin-2019. It was organized in Pune (Aundh Military Station) on October 7, 2019. The meaning of "Ekuverin" in the official language of Maldives, Dhivehi is ‘Friends’.
